Title: Establishes a notice and consent form for the notification of parents and guardians of college students that are identified as potentially at-risk for suicide
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to develop a notice and consent form to be provided to students and parents by colleges and universities in the state upon acceptance of prospective students to college or university, authorizing permission to contact the parents or guardians of students identified as potentially at-risk for suicide.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of education to develop a notice and consent form for the notification of parents and guardians of college students that are identified as potentially at-risk for suicide
